title: Queenstown - Remarkables
content:
The first few days of the trip have been great! We spent 3 days in a row at the Remarkables, and pretty much all were bluebird. Emma and BJ joined us for the last 2, and that was heaps of fun - seeing them board pushed me to try some new stuff, and it was great to have more people to share the holiday with for a short while.

Had some delicious meals so far as well! Coyote Mexican (nachos and chimichanga, some of the best I’ve ever had) Brazz (with Emma and BJ - steakhouse; we had ribs, steak, and parmi) Hikari Japanese (with Emma and BJ - delicious Japanese food; we had sushi, gyoza, chicken katsu, mussels, tempura udon, beef teriyaki, and a bunch of tasty sake!). Ended up going out to Barmuda after dinner - lots of fun and interesting watching the bartenders make cocktails!Coyote Mexican… again (with Emma and BJ - shared dips, and had enchilada + chimichanga, fajitas, squid (sizzling dishes), and magaritas and tequila shots!).

This was Emma and BJ’s last night in town, so we ended up going to a few bars (Sundeck, Bunker, Zephyr) to farewell them - again plenty of fun just hanging out!
